attributes.action: Do Not Give the Citizens of Hong Kong full British citizenship.
attributes.additional_details: There are not enough houses, jobs, schools, hospital or facilities for 3,000,000 residents to come over here. Also why should us taxpayers fund these when none of them have contributed to our economy. It will decimate our recovery just so this government can look good. Help the homeless people on our streets first.
attributes.background: Do not let up to 3,000,000 hong kong residents have residency rights in the UK.
